author: Unknown
solution: const validParent = string => { let stack = []; let map = { '(': ')', '[': ']', '{': '}', }; for (let i = 0; i < string.length; i++) { if (string[i] === '(' || string[i] === '{' || string[i] === '[') { stack.push(string[i]);  } else { let last = stack.pop(); if (string[i] !== map[last]) { return false; } } } if (stack.length !== 0) { return false; } return true; };
